title: Beachfront Escape in Asia's Next Great Foodie City
description: Discover the melting pot of cultures and traditions of Penang with a stay at the Mercure Penang Beach, located steps away from a pristine beach and just 20 minutes from the UNESCO World Heritage-listed site of George Town. Soak up uninterrupted sea views from your room and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a set lunch or dinner, 20% discount on food and beverages at the hotel's restaurant and bar, a VIP private airport pick up, early check-in or late check-out and a welcome drink on arrival.
offer_address: 505, Jalan Tanjung Bungah, 11200 Tanjung Bungah, Pulau Pinang, Malaysia
